tokens.resolved_gloss: a heel (as protuberant); hence, a track; figuratively, the rear (of an army)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to fasten upon; hence, to seize, be strong (figuratively, courageous, causatively strengthen, cure, help, repair, fortify), obstinate; to bind, restrain, conquer

tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
